projects.title: School Landing Page
projects.description: Built with NextJs, designed with vanilla CSS. It contains Teacher, Courses, Blog, About views. I created this project to solve the problem of easy accessibility to lecturers and professors in the department.

projects.title: News Aggregator
projects.description: Created with Python web Framework, Django. With a robust backend and a search functionality, I added Django Apscheduler for handling tasks, Postgresql for Database storage. Hosted with heroku also implemented the power of Bootstrap

projects.title: Movies Search App
projects.description: Built with React Library, Backed with Redux @toolkit for state management... Fetch Api with Ajax calls. I implemented the app with search input containing both movies and series search.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: This Web App is powered by Python Framework, Django as backend, React for frontend... Design made with Chakra UI. I used Redux-persist for storing authentication keys collected from backend

projects.title: Blog Web App
projects.description: This Web App is powered by Python Framework, Django as backend... Design made with Bootstrap for design. I added Wagtail for Content Management.

projects.title: Pizza Ordering App
projects.description: This Web App is powered by Python Framework, Django as backend. Design made with Bootstrap with great functionality. Feature includes Login & Register, Cart, Checkout and Order Placement

projects.title: Expense Tracker Swagger UI
projects.description: Expense Tracker backend interface made with Python(Django). I implemented the user interface with Swagger UI also added Authorization with rest_framework authorization where every route is protected. Also included CORS header for cross- origin.

projects.title: Wifibase Landing Page
projects.description: Built with NextJs, styling made with Chakra UI. It contains Home, About, Services, Register & Login views. I created this project to help clients and customers know more about the company and all it entails.
